entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary: A period of snow is expected about higher parts of the road Friday morning when 1 to 2 cm may accumulate above 800 metres. Snow showers may continue for the remainder of Friday but accumulations on the road are not expected.

entry.title: Heavy Rain Watch
entry.summary: A period of heavy northerly rain, and amounts may approach short duration warning criteria. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Low.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Heavy Rain Watch
entry.summary: A period of heavy rain. Rainfall amounts may approach warning criteria within 15 km east of the main divide. Freezing level about 2000 metres in heavy rain. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Low.
